post.title: What's your earliest memory of the Internet?

body: Getting my brother to download [Reckless Drivin'](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zbeu2ptqya8) for me. We had one of those purple CRT macs at the time.
body_html: Getting my brother to download Reckless Drivin' for me. We had one of those purple CRT macs at the time.

post.title: What's your earliest memory of the Internet?

body: I definitely had something else to say in response but then I saw this and decided it was the most truthful representation of my first impression. Also loved having to make sure no one in the house was on the phone or needed the phone soon.

post.title: What's your earliest memory of the Internet?

author.bio: I like to make things and play video games.
author.bio_html: I like to make things and play video games.

body: A friend of mine who worked for Microsoft gave me his old computer about 25 years ago. I was impressed by how many things I could do with it, but I would often come home from work really late and I would often be too tired to sit on a desk.
body_html: A friend of mine who worked for Microsoft gave me his old computer about 25 years ago. I was impressed by how many things I could do with it, but I would often come home from work really late and I would often be too tired to sit on a desk.

parent.body: Putting a blanket over the computer because it's late at night and you don't want your mom to know you're sneaking on.
parent.body_html: Putting a blanket over the computer because it's late at night and you don't want your mom to know you're sneaking on.

post.title: What's your earliest memory of the Internet?

body: BBS that could send email from FIDOnet to the internet.  I was kind of fuzzy on what the internet was, other than it linked together powerful supercomputers and was used by academics.  I didn't have any mail to send to professors, so I never used it.
body_html: BBS that could send email from FIDOnet to the internet. I was kind of fuzzy on what the internet was, other than it linked together powerful supercomputers and was used by academics. I didn't have any mail to send to professors, so I never used it.

post.title: What's your earliest memory of the Internet?

body: Man... now that I remember I think one of the first times I've ever used the internet was browsing lego forums. I was a lot younger at that time.
